Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Leverage Technology Development To Build A Better Future – CEPE invites…
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Once again Center For Practical Education (CEPE) is holding another webinar as part of its core objective to encourage a more practical form of theoretical education in the country and possibly, worldwide. For some couple of time, this foundation has strived to promote a need for “The use of the mind, heart and hand“ instead...

item.title: Beauty Queen Asked To Resign From Her Jobs For Being Too Pretty…
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Although she was well qualified and trained with a double degree in European studies and from the faculty of law, she was made to resign from her jobs for being too pretty...
